35243017.review: This is the demo, it's a good puzzle game. It is  bit creepy, but it is quite easy. Can't wait to try out the full release. Which is Nevrosa: Escape.

35186493.review:
This is an awfully short Escape Room experience.  I'm not sure what exactly happened.  I didn't understand any of the story.  The puzzles were mostly aligning things correctly and putting the square peg into the square peg.  Nice spooky atmosphere keeps you going.  Nice graphics, but you do need full roomscale as there is no teleporting.  

Rating 6/10 It was free, so yeah it's a 6

35136675.review:
Recommending this short experience as it is free – no particular problems other than grabbing some items did not seem to register normally from time to time.

Howerver it would be nice to have the ability to teleport (or some tool to fetch items) for people that don't have large rooms to get to places out of reach. I had problems getting the red cube that bounced outside of the play zone when it first appeared and had to restart. Also had an issue when I dropped the candle by example – there was no way to get it back (other than restarting).

For your reference the room setup was exactly 2 X 2 meters.

35056874.review: Out of the dozens of games I have played, this is the only one that I had to stop and go back to. Arachnaphobia Warning!

34772935.review:
Daumen hoch für ein Kostenloses SUPER Game

Dieses Kostenlose Game ist besser als die meisten Kostenpflichtigen Games eigentlich finde ich das schon komisch da die meisten Kostenlosen VR Spiele oft mehr spielespass haben als games für die man zahlen muß und die dann in 1 Stunde durchgezockt sind,für diesen Aufwand sollte man es sich echt gut überlegen ob man sich überhaupt eine VR Brille zulegt da die meisten Games imm VR mit den selben Slogen Stehen (das da Spiel noch nicht Fertiggstellt ist...usw)

Nevrosa: Prelude sollte weiterentwickelt werden der Anfang verspricht schonmal sehr viel da auch der Efeckt gut getroffen ist aber leider ist es nur eine Kostenlose Vorführung und von einem Game in vollversion keine Rede.

VR Games gibts ja schon reichlich aber leider auch noch sehr Fehlerhaft und als VR Game bezeichnet zu werden das ist für manche echt eine FRECHHEIT !!

Ich hoffe das sich in den Nöchsten Jahren in den VR Games was Bessert sonst war die teure Anschaffung meiner Oculus Rift Brille für die Katz.

34652012.review: awsome, can't wait for the full game.

34440590.review:
Just. So. Good.
Please. Make. More.

34438799.review:
One of the hidden VR gems — this short experience will blow you away with descent horror atmosphere and unique locomotion (more devs should do this!).

As it says, there are no jumpscares. I'd like to mention high quality CG you can find here — can't believe that was done by few indies.

Totally recommend for all VR owners.

34351634.review: Neat little puzzle game at a great price.

34342351.review:
Short but sweet. If this is any indication of what Nevrosa: Escape will be like, than I have much to look foward to. The game utilizes an average room-scale playspace exactly as VR games should. You don't need to teleport. It changes your position within the environment fluidly and inteligently to tell and progress the story and solve the puzzles. Its very atmospheric, with art-deco, almost bioshockesque feel. This is the pinnacle of VR experiences as of now. The right amount of suspense and horror, the right amount of panic.

oh and it's FREE!!!!!!!!!! GET IT NOW!!!

34213497.review:
Ein an sich sehr nett gemachtes Puzzle Game mit einer tollen Atmosphäre. Leider sehr kurz und hat auch ein paar Bugs die etwas nerven.

Unter anderem ist die Bodenhöhe meistens nicht korrekt sodass man Probleme hat Geganstände auf dem Boden aufzuheben. Und manchmal buggen die Controller meiner Vive sodass Gegenstände einfach mal fallen gelassen werden. Passierte mir meistens an unpassenden Stellen und ich bin gestorben.

Es gibt ein Achievement das kann man nur einmal bekommen. Wenn man stirbt wars das und es ist nicht mehr freischaltbar. Es gibt allerdings eine Möglichkeit die Errungenschaft doch noch zu bekommen, indem man das Spiel löscht und auch in der Regestry alles entfernt. Daraufhin habt ihr einen neuen Versuch. Schafft ihr es nicht beim ersten mal wieder alles löschen und neu installieren.

Da es kostenlos ist empfehle ich es trotz der oben genannten Probleme.

34178717.review:
Really creepy and fun experience.   Had a few issues getting my Oculus Touch controllers to grab things that were on the ground.   Definitely going to try and reset my home and try again but it might be a difference between Vive and Oculus controllers. 

Either way it's worth trying for a unique creepy interactive puzzle game.   Hope to see more from these guys because it's definitely unique.

34114026.review: This is a positive review. Mostly because it is free. It has promise. But in case any devs are reading these, there is a problem in that many people have standing room space (mine is 7x5 which I consider standing room) and the game doesn't have locomotion. I know the game recommends minimum 2x1.5 meters so I was at the minimum allowable space. Also, where the items are placed in my limited space are in awkward spots in the room, like the edges of my 7x5 space. If you can't do locomotion then maybe give the player the ability to turn, or just hold a button to reorient/recenter. If that could be improved upon, it would make the experience more enjoyable and less frustrating.
34114026.developer_response:
Hi, sure we read ;)

Thanks for your feedback!

34087520.review:
This game is very short, but it is to be expected since its free.  I only had minor issues playing the game; the minor annoyance I encountered is that the room scale seems to be a bit off as in the height of things in the game such as letters on the walls are slightly lower than eye level which cause me to bend down slightly to read them (Maybe this can be changed in settings?).  Also there were some issues in getting things to interact properly within the game.

Other than that I found it enjoyable, there are some jumpy moments, but not as scary as it is creepy.  

I would definitely recommend as a quick (free) way to get used to the VR experience.

34053737.review: Enchanting. A lot of good horror elements without inducing an uncomfortable experience. Can't wait for more!

34044911.review:
Fantastic approach of Vr. Very well designed, great graphics, great roomscale experience, great use of shadows and light to catch your attention, and very clever use of one of the most efficient way to trick our brain in order to optain a good sense of presence: the positional tracking (developpers play with scales and things to looks in close up) ! One of the best feature of the new generation of Vr headset but not used enough. 

Keep going guys! Your work is brilliant!

34035064.review: Nice little VR experience. Typical escaperoom gameplay but in a fun fictional horror enviroment. Would love to play a full release of it.

33637519.review: Cool and very good looking but also extremely short roomscale puzzle experience. Worth downloading and playing for sure since it's free. Just remember that this won't last more than a few minutes.

33571326.review:
This is a short game experience but it is stunning and beautiful, tbh i'm not a huge fan of jump scare games, and most of the genre rely on that (with some expections off course), but this was the perfect blend of scary without following that path, and was a nice surprise the outcome of that. 
There is a constant element of fear and tension and help create the mood perfectly, and right now, i´m looking forward to the full experience, wich will be awesome if they continue this path all along.

33321262.review: game didn't work for me. First there was a virus downloaded with the programme, then the game was glitched. Using Vive, you couldn't ungrip your hand which meant only two pickups were possible (one per hand. The hands then disappeared if you went onto the home menu and didn't return. looked like it was a good graphics setup and felt eerie but I was sadly let down
33321262.developer_response:
Hi, first of all — no viruses included, you are safe :)
Maybe your antivirus software made a mistake and deleted some files from the game? This could cause those glitches you described.

What antivirus do you use?

You are the only one with such a problem, we want to investigate it.

32332861.review:
The un-released game, Nevrosa, might be good. We can see that it will have decent production values, and that it will be designed for VR specifically. 

The room-scale aspect might become an issue. They plan for the whole game to take place in 1 room, so who knows how well that will turn out. We don't know how short the full game will be. We don't know if the developers will implement smart or stupid design decisions. And we don't know it will be worth the $47, or $19, or $1 they'll charge for it.

Yet all the reviews here are reviewing that hypothetical nonetheless, rather than the extremely tiny demo in front of you.

------------------------------------

Nevrosa: Prelude isn't a game. It's an interactive trailer. The install takes far longer than exhausting its content, which is about 10 minutes if you don't know what you're doing, 2 minutes if you do. That's not an exaggeration. That's why even a 50 second trailer video (in Steam) repeats so much of itself. There is nothing more to see in Nevrosa: Prelude.

So watch the video, then see if you feel like doing it again interactively. 

I don't recommend it because I don't recommend advertisements to people. There are plenty of free VR games out there that respect the player's time by giving them something to play. The Lab. Bullet Train. Lucky's Tale. Accounting. 

The tiny demo is produced well but tiny. It is not worth being in a part of the Steam store that you can write reviews for.

32270285.review: sign of good things to come from the developer

32259884.review: Great atmosphere! I'm now looking forward to whatever full game this might develop into.

32190460.review: 流程不长，但解谜元素和画质挺好的，免费游戏中的良心作品。

32164783.review: I haven't completed this but it's good for a free title. Worth a go.

32146946.review: It's a really cool and creepy horror/escape room experience.  A few bugs, but...FREE and totally worth it

32120950.review: Please release this beautiful game. Take your time on it. Don't give up.

32092563.review: When does the full game get released?!?

31976466.review: This demo gives a taste of what I love in VR. It puts you in a space, and does a good job of being usettling without using cheap jumpscares, or boring overt horror tropes. It's not overly long, but it doesn't need to be. This is a great way to get a taste of what I'm sure will be a much talked about game when it releases in full. One thing I will say is that if you have a small game space, you may have to be clever with how you move around. I have a space of roughly 6 x 6.5 feet, and while I was able to do everything I needed to in order to progress, it did drag me out of the experience when something was too close for my sensors (Playing on Oculus). This obviously says nothing about the game, just a heads up if you're in a smaller space as it points out in the details. All in all, can't wait for the full game, and to see what else the devs make me do in it!

31349000.review:
Se trata de uma prelude do jogo que chega ainda este ano com terror e vários puzzle,nessa pequena apresentação do jogo vc tem que resolver alguns enigmas e até dar cabo de um anão ogro kkkk muito legal mesmo a unica coisa ruim dela é que acaba cedo,mas baseado nessa pequena demo posso afirmar q vem coisa boa ai,realmente este game promete!

I love how VR has given developers the ability to create interactive trailers such as this. Well-made, creepy teaser! Great idea using riderected walking, also; it fits the game well. I hope more room-scale games will start implementing this.

I'm definitely sold on purchasing the rest when it's released. WOW, this is a really interesting game.

At first I have to say I'm not into horror games at all, ok I've played RE7, but does it count as horror? I don't know.
So I thought, why not, just give it a try, it is free and they said there are no jumpscares (I hate Jumpscares). 

Ok started the game... I was standing in a room, dark, feels eerie. 
Took the headset off and thought NO! I can't do this...

Two minutes later...
But I want to see what kind of game this is.

Second try, scared as $h!t, walking around, something is coming. Or not? Took a candle, look around.
What is this? A dwarf? Maybe not, more like a giant, as i saw ten minutes later.

This game is spooky, it is really spooky, but it's good! Movement feels very natural, the riddles are great and need 
at least some kind of intelligence and time. 

Can't wait for more to come!

30382686.review: Well done, creepy, ran smooth as butter. It's now at the top of my list to show newbies the power of VR. Looking forward to the full experience

30343025.review: Another example of Triple-A VR content rising to the surface. This is gothic/steampunk, horror-esq room escape. Oddly enough, you don't see the room's walls, because you and the game objects are inside of a much larger space, that is shrouded in darkness. I liked this. There were had other novelties as well, such as the ability to die, and the spider-key interaction -- don't touch the sides! Making the player tiny (and redirected walking in general) is in my opinion, the most effective, and immerse VR locomotion system, and should be employed whenever possible. I hope for a future where the egg-heads really fiqure out VR game design such that progress in the game works to allievate physical annoyances and corret player direction. [spoiler]See also: https://megasteakman.itch.io/outside-the-box[/spoiler] http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=877582579

Very short demo/promo but well worth the time downloading and playing. 
The puzzles are well done and reasonably logical with the tools you have available to you. The horror is the context and theme rather than out and out gore or jump scares. You actually got a reasonable about of feedback to know if you were going right or wrong where some puzzle games give you nothing until you find the solution.
Some of the controls need a bit more finesse, the final one in particular was hard to control.
Well done devs, more please.

30210777.review: Very creepy atmosphere, and great gameplay. Looking forward to the full game.

30210261.review:
更多VR游戏评测尽在83830

　　《Nevrosa：序曲》是一款冒险解谜游戏，游戏中玩家将置身在一个漆黑的房间内，需要独自一个人探索解谜，找到真相。
　
　和经典解谜游戏《神秘岛》相似，游戏中并不会给予玩家明显的提示，玩家必须自行探索找到线索和破解机关。漆黑的场景加上破解机关后触发的各种惊吓元素让游戏的氛围营造的很到位。不过游戏的流程较短，仅仅只是提供了一个序章的体验内容，而且对于玩家体验时的空间有一定的要求，因为游戏采用的是范围性移动，过于狭小的空间很容易让玩家在体验时碰撞到其他东西。
　
　游戏在Steam上免费下载，为玩家展示了一个高品质冒险解谜游戏的序章体验，感兴趣的玩家可以自行下载体验，并加入到愿望单关注游戏后续完整版的情况。

30207078.review: Great short little horror experience with no jumpscares.  Looking forward to the full release.

30203165.review: Quite fun! This is the only horror game I've played on the Vive since it doesn't have jumpscares, and the puzzle element makes it great!

30195898.review: Достаточно интересная небольшая демка/игра. Атмосферненько, немного страшно, особенно если играть в наушниках. Скачать, посмотреть можно, особенно за бесплатно.

30188707.review: I wish this was longer. This is amazing. It's a free download so don't read anything about the game and just go in blind. You won't be disappointed. This will be an instant buy for me when it comes out.

30184753.review: For a creepy puzzle game i really did enjoy this introduction to Nervosa. The puzzles are diffucult but in the way that no one person wants to pay to much attention to 1 puzzle for more then a few minutes. Not to sure what the story will be like but it ran beautifuly and im looking forward to playing this game at full release. The only down side i have for this game is I imagine you need a larger play space due to no locomotion in game yet. All of the assests seem to be preloaded in your play space. So if you do try this out make sure you have a larger play space. This game might also have the same features though much like Job simulator where the enviorment is sized properly based on your play space. If so then even in a small space you should try this demo.

30177508.review: Very short demo but also very good :D Looking forward to the full game and hoping it lives up to the demo :) Awsome atmosphere and ran with out a hitch on I7 6700k Skylake and gtx1080 .

30169521.review:
Only a 5minute demo - whats to review??  EVERYTHING as it turns out!  This is an AMAZING short roomscale based mystery experience.  The level of detail and polish is great.  The puzzles are interesting and intuitive like a horror version of Myst or The Room - the characters are huge and intimdating - I honestly didnt think i could bring myself to pickup the key (once you play you'll know what I mean). 

I genuinely can't wait to see what the full game brings when its released later this year, likely a Day 1 purchase for me when its out.  Exceptional work Devs!

30155312.review:
この世でVRと最も相性が良いのはホラーゲームだと思う。
普通のホラーゲームはどちらかというと笑いながらプレーするけど
VRだと薄暗くて不穏な音してるだけ怖い、ずるい。
何が怖いってカートに入れた記憶もないしDLした記憶もないのにインストール完了してたのが一番怖い。

プロローグという事で凄く短いのと、終わりが唐突（10分）
あの終わりで正解なのかすら分からないくらい唐突。
ルームスケールのみで移動の補助が無いので実際に2m x1.5mが必要な点に注意。

30152629.review:
+ Demo corta pero interesante. Puzzle inquietante. Gráficamente cumple y crea una buena ambientación, consiguiendo una   muy buena inmersión en mi área de juego de 2x2 m. Sonido 3D muy logrado.

- Algunos bugs en las manos atravesando objetos. 

Deseando ver más !!

30149759.review: Damn. Very well made. Kinda difficult, a couple puzzles transition strangely and aren't super intuitive, but VERY polished and very creepy. Looking forward to full game!

30148593.review: Cool game, creepy rather than jump scares & graphics look great.

30144686.review:
Very good design and ambiance.
Lights feel pretty well managed (The lab renderer technology ?) and immersive.

Gameplay and design make it very attractive, can't wait for the final game.

Will buy it.

30143893.review:
Wow, just wow... I don't usually write reviews but I wanted to make sure I stopped by and rated this experience. Everything from the beautiful Art Deco style, to the polished controls, to the beautiful collision system, just very well done. The theme is beautiful, from the atmosphere, to sound, right down to the little hidden details like the painting (wont spoil, but I know what it represents) right down to the beautiful attention to detail is amazing! I even dig the notes written that bring in the story! Nothing like reading something while looking over your shoulder with a candle into the darkness!

Thank you, and please work on this every day, at every free moment, even if you only have 10 minutes, and it will get done, I can't wait...

Yes Yes Yes...! This is What VR is!

30139599.review: 绝对好评， 画质上乘， 解密过程脑洞也比较大，流程不是很长我用了十分钟通关， 比起一些收费的游戏都棒 ， 最重要的是居然还免费， 难得的良心游戏。一定要试试。

30136564.review:
Awesome teaser for a game they're working on.  It's very beautiful, has got a wonderful spooky atmosphere,  amazing sound, excellent physics and it's fun to play.
The developers were obviously aiming for perfection, so I was suprised to see one little and easily corrected flaw : the player's hands are so very plastic.  Nevertheless, this is a game I definitely want to play when it's released!!

30132420.review: Wow. Very polished demo. Looking forward to the full game.
